text: Treigny is a former commune. It is found in the Yonne department in the center of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Treigny- Perreuse-Sainte-Colombe.Arrêté préfectoral 29 November 2018, modified 17 December 2018 ==References== *INSEE Category:Former communes in Yonne
title: Treigny
